features.title: Own content or RSS feed
features.description: You can either embed the content inside the html page or set a RSS feed and the content will be generated from it..

features.title: Any HTML Content
features.description: Any content can be inserted inside each news item. Those will be handled and displayed properly when the news are closed and will look the way you set them when the news is enlarged.

features.title: Super Customizable
features.description: 30+ smart js options that can change the feel and look of the widget.From sizes, animations to text and styles. Everything can be customized and dynamically changed via CSS.

features.title: Set Height or Set Number of News
features.description: You can either set a height and the plugin will calculate how many news items to display, or you can set the number of items to display and the height will be calculated accordingly.

features.title: Full-Page Reader or Widget Reader
features.description: You can choose between 2 different types of readers. The Full-Page reader opens a full page lightbox style reader while the widget opens the article in the place of the widget. 10 built nimations

features.title: 8 Different Arrows Positions
features.description: I've included 8 different button positions: left, right, sides, top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right, top/bottom.

features.title: External Links
features.description: You can add external links to your news/articles and set them as the default open action. You can also add a continue reading button inside the article iteslf. You can also set its text via a js option.

features.title: Customizable Link Text
features.description: You can edit the link text and add the title to the link with suffexes or prefixes. You can change any text used inside the widget from the options directly.

features.title: Override Options for Specific Items
features.description: For example you can add specific link texts(check example, item 4). You can also set cropping on and off, etc.. Those options are set directly to the item, explained in documentation.

features.title: Multiple Animations Included
features.description: Every movement can be customized. You can choose from multiple animations, set their duration and even add a delay. 2 Hover Styles included.

features.title: Image Support
features.description: Add images to the News. You can set image cropping on/off and define a fixed height. Ofcourse when the image is clicked it is expanded! You can override the settings for specific items.

features.title: Unminified Source
features.description: You get unminified version of JS code and nicely organized CSS files. You're free to modify any source files to fit your needs.
